p: The growing medium applied affected the percentage composition of each essential oil constituent. The highest concentrations of borneol (16.46%) and 1,8-cineole (4.58%) were noticed in the volatile oil isolated from plants cultivated on the medium supplemented with gold nanoparticles (50 mg·dm −3 AuNPs). Addition of silver nanoparticles (50 mg·dm −3 AgNPs) to the growing medium increased the content of γ-cadinene (6.08%) and caryophyllene oxide (12.23%) in the oil ( Figure 1).
